text:
@Timcast When the deaths per day started dropping rapidly:  https://t.co/zBMGvpGMf8

Notice how the curve is flattening for total deaths as a function of time.  Eyeballing that trend, it seems that it will asymptotically approach ~180k ballpark.  It's just a bad flu season, that's all.
